Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Every lecturer gives a different type of feedback, some leave 2 sentences on the positives with no constructive criticism. 
AI at least - I can give the rubric descriptor, give it my paragraphs and ask it if it meets the criteria - it then tells me the positives where it does meet and what I can add to make it better.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Teacher feedback feels personal. I can envisage someone on the other end who can't be bothered reading 1000 essays, rushing through writing some half-assed feedback. 
Gen AI is less personal and I feel like it has my best interest at heart.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
Gen AI feedback is INSTANT. 
waiting 3-5 weeks for feedback that hinges on the next assignment is PAINFUL
